Connect suction tube.sentence: The nurse prepares the suction machine for use.
Connect suction tube.subject: The nurse

Connect suction tube.sentence: The nurse checks the suction tubing for any defects or blockages.
Connect suction tube.subject: The nurse

Connect suction tube.sentence: The nurse connects one end of the suction tube to the suction machine.
Connect suction tube.subject: The nurse
Connect suction tube.object: one end of the suction tube

Connect suction tube.sentence: The nurse connects the other end of the suction tube to the appropriate suction site.
Connect suction tube.subject: The nurse
Connect suction tube.object: the other end of the suction tube

Connect suction tube.sentence: The nurse tests the suction machine to ensure it is functioning properly.
Connect suction tube.subject: The nurse
